title: *****JULY/AUGUST PET-FRIENDLY 1BED-SOUTH END CENTRAL AC & W/D IN-UNIT!
posting_body: ['AVAILABLE NOW!', 'JULY/AUGUST MOVE-IN', '1/2 FEE PAID BY OWNER', 'VIRTUAL TOURS AVAILABLE', 'An updated and very spacious 1 bath rental apartment for lease on Melrose St in the South End neighborhood of Boston!', 'The unit is located in a professionally managed building that includes heat and hot water in the rent price and is very close to the MBTA Green and Orange Lines at Arlington, as well as New England Medical Center.', ' Unit features included an in-unit washer/dryer and central AC.', ' Dogs and cats are considered by the landlord-pet fees apply, no off-street parking, and students are considered with co-signers.', 'Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!', 'BenC @', 'Benjaminapartments .', 'com', '860-485-5721', 'Transportation', 'Bus: 43 Tremont St @ Marginal St (0.06 mi)', 'Bus: 10 Boylston St @ Clarendon St (0.39 mi)', 'Bus: 15 Washington St @ Perry St (0.44 mi)', 'Bus: SL4 Tufts Medical Center (0.23 mi)', 'Bus: 11 E Berkeley St @ Washington St (0.37 mi)', 'Bus: 9 Arlington St @ Isabella St (0.08 mi)', 'Subway: Orange Line Tufts Medical Center (0.21 mi)', 'Rail: Franklin Line Back Bay (0.41 mi)', 'Bus: 39 Back Bay (0.36 mi)', 'Bus: 504 Kneeland St @ Washington St (0.29 mi)', 'Tram: D Arlington (0.25 mi)', 'Bus: 501 Surface Artery @ Kneeland St (0.43 mi)', 'Bus: 55 Stuart St @ Charles St S (0.15 mi)', 'Bus: SL5 Tremont St @ Boylston Station (0.34 mi)', 'Bus: 459 Otis St @ Summer St (0.60 mi)', 'Subway: Red Line Downtown Crossing (0.60 mi)']
